text: I recently got a syntax error in my documenter workflow, any hints

elements.text: I recently got a syntax error in my documenter workflow, any hints

text:
```name: Documenter
on:
    push:
    branches: [master]
    tags: [v*]
    pull_request:

jobs:
    Documenter:
    name: Documentation
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
        - uses: actions/checkout@v2
        - uses: julia-actions/julia-buildpkg@latest
        - uses: julia-actions/julia-docdeploy@latest
        env:
            GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
            DOCUMENTER_KEY: ${{ secrets.DOCUMENTER_KEY }}```
It complains about the line before `env`

elements.text:
name: Documenter
on:
    push:
    branches: [master]
    tags: [v*]
    pull_request:

jobs:
    Documenter:
    name: Documentation
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
        - uses: actions/checkout@v2
        - uses: julia-actions/julia-buildpkg@latest
        - uses: julia-actions/julia-docdeploy@latest
        env:
            GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
            DOCUMENTER_KEY: ${{ secrets.DOCUMENTER_KEY }}
